ast.name: Cliffhangers
ast.comment: A hangman-like game for books. All puns intended.

displayBody.text: The following box makes the top buttons
This next box displays the UI for the user to specify the game data.

body.text: Display the picture that shows the destroying man

thenBody.text: Ok. There's a letter here we haven't seen before. Here goes. Add it to the set
Oh dear. Let's take a turn off.

body.text: All we have to do left is to update guessed letters
Now the final 2 things. Either the game is done or the level is done then
